website_summaries.verdict: High-performance combination building on B&W's proven drivers and Bluetooth aptX.
pros: Combines great acoustics from B&W's drivers, with advanced aptX Bluetooth streaming, to access exceptional sound from smart phones, tablets, and computers
Drive units based on award-winning design from B&W's line, which have a diaphragm like traditional loudspeakers
Full 17 hours of wireless playback between charges
Charges via USB, but can also be used with included cable to save battery
cons: Some purchasers complained about poor Bluetooth performance, however, this feature is known to sometimes require several hours of play time before it is "broken in" and working at its best

website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins P5 Wireless is an impressive-sounding luxury Bluetooth headphone, but its high price tempers our enthusiasm.
pros: The Bowers and Wilkins P5 Wireless headphones have excellent build quality and deliver rich, well-balanced sound for Bluetooth headphones (they perform even better in wired mode)
The earpads are removable, and a cable is included for wired listening along with a nice carrying case
The tight seal shuts out a lot of external noise and the headphones don't leak sound
Battery life is quite good at 17 hours
cons: Pretty pricey for an on-ear Bluetooth headphone
leather earpads will cause your ears to get steamy on warmer days (headphones may fit some people a little too snugly)
included cable doesn't have an inline remote/microphone

website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins P5 Wireless is one of the more expensive Bluetooth headphone pairs on the market for good reason—it delivers brilliant audio in a smart, attractive design.
pros: Fantastic audio performance with rich, articulate lows and crystal clear highs
Smart, handsome design with secure, comfortable fit
Wired, passive mode automatically shuts off battery

customer_reviews.title: Terrible company with terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Terrible terrible TERRIBLE customer service. The headphones stopped working after 9 months, and though B&W claim to offer a warranty, good luck getting information on how to access this warranty. All I get are robot emails stating someone will be in touch with me within 1-2 business days. It's been over 10 and still nothing. Now I will have to take this up with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W Cooney

customer_reviews.title: I love b&w speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love b&w speakers. I have the home system and they are above and beyond what I’ve owned from Bose. These earphones became uncomfortable rather quickly. Ears get pretty sweaty. Sound was good but not very immersive or full. But the reason I returned it was because it the pairing did not work well. It would click off and on while walking at a fast pace (not run). I was willing to pay more so I got the sennheiser earphones instead. I’m happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: aimlesswander

customer_reviews.title: The build quality on these is just superb. They ...
customer_reviews.text: The build quality on these is just superb. They are also quite small yet still perfectly fit my giant melon of a noggin. Impressive. Update: The sound has improved with some time. Bass response is now excellent. Maybe the best product I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Proud Owner
customer_reviews.text: I think I've broken the sound in finally. They are comfortable and attractive. I think the sound was good but I was expecting to be blown away and I wasn't. Other music devices have started to sound worse so maybe the headphones are training my ear to better sounding music? Some bass frequencies sound great but others are subdued. I got used to the bass but that was a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed. Sound quality was not what I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: "Volume down" button does not work. Volume up works, play / pause / siri button works, (though finicky), but the volume down button does nothing. Pretty disappointed. Sound quality was not what I expected either. Hoping I got a lemon here...
customer_reviews.author: dan1987

customer_reviews.title: Great for sound but gives me a headache
customer_reviews.text: Great for sound but gives me a headache. 5 star if you are using for 20 minutes at the range, 3 if you want to use for any other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT. Very user friendly, just don't over think it and you will do fine. Impressed with the sound too.
customer_reviews.author: FUAH

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Too quality sound, look and feel. Pairs up easily, intelligently. Was very happy with my. P2 for travel and P3 with cord. P5 wirless is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had Bluetooth issues out of the box. Returned for the Bang&Olufson. They rock
customer_reviews.author: Albud69

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: These headphones deliver beautiful sound quality and styling. They were so simple to connect to my phone, laptop and desktop computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound headphones. My only gripe is that they feel tight on the head. I wear a 73/8 hat, which isn't big, so they should feel a little easier to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. These are first class in every way
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. These are first class in every way, materials, construction, design, and best of all.. Sound quality. I'm in LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very please with this product great sound clarity as expected from bower & wilkin what better is the delivery service I was told it will be at least 1 to 3 week wait time but got it in 4 days wow I'm very please very very please.
customer_reviews.author: Sanh Le

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blue tooth headphones. Full-bodied sound and a nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marc R. Feldesman

customer_reviews.title: Wireless is fantastic. Same sound quality with mobility to move around ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased wired version 4 years ago. Wireless is fantastic. Same sound quality with mobility to move around without source device. Heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cord Freedom.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite on ear headphone, made really versatile with Bluetooth connectivity. The included cord keeps its hard wire connection sound top notch, and B&W's engineers have enabled the wireless sound to be pretty close to the wired sound. I would give the Bluetooth connectivity 4 stars for a few short cutouts (not drops) at distance at times, but overall quite good. Phone calls are well handled with no complaints from callers as to audio quality. Construction is exquisite, and for its price, is expected.
customer_reviews.author: TMcGeeF18

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Simply excellent. Great audiophile quality sound, very comfortable, and they sound even better when wired. And the look is simply sophisticated.
customer_reviews.author: IG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Note that when you set this up on a Windows PC, two drivers will be installed, one for voice, one for music.
customer_reviews.author: James U.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good though.
customer_reviews.text: A mediocre and overpriced headphones. The plastic part with buttons feels very cheap and the volume down button doesn't work at all (on a $400 headphones!). Volume up and centre buttons work but they press with a crackling sound. The sound is good though.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: These are truly amazing. I owned the P3
customer_reviews.text: These are truly amazing. I owned the P3. Really wanted a P5 but did not have the money at the time. When I get the P5 and wireless it was a done deal!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Olson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the purchase. Surprising comfort paired with great audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Silva

customer_reviews.title: Sounds excellent, kind of uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: They sound amazing, but they can get uncomfortable after wearing them for a while. But, it's kind of worth it, they sound really good. I've never spent this kind of money on headphones before, but after buying these I wish I would have a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Bets headphone I had ever.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The sound quality is better then anything else I've heard. Works at any corner of my apartment. Comes with cable so if you don't like bluetooth option you can always use cable. The leather had very high quality. Fits my head perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Bahdanau

customer_reviews.title: the sound of these headphones is the best I have heard
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the sound of these headphones is the best I have heard. However, the bluetooth ranger is so poor that I have downgraded my rating to three stars and am looking for a replacement. Such a shame for a great-sounding set of headphones. I have a Bose set that has much better bluetooth coverage.
customer_reviews.author: CB3 Financial Group, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. I do recommend the 20hr break in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I do recommend the 20hr break in period though. Since letting them run on heavy bass songs for a whole day plugged in, music sounds significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper D.

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I really really really love these things. I've owned way too many headphones. Mostly IEMs and few On Ears. These are my favorite headphones and these are the best wireless headphones I've tested (sound-wise). I've found range to be good, occasionally wonky but not any more than other headsets. They look very nice as well. They'd be killer if they could fold but they're not huge at all (and i have a small head). So, several thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: ILikeNiceThings

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and quality is great though.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were louder. Convenience and quality is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound, but B&W QC sucks ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound really awesome, but arrived with one volume button dead :-(
customer_reviews.author: Zeta

customer_reviews.title: Only if they worked as good as the looked.
customer_reviews.text: These headphone look great. But the Bluetooth range is horrid. Place your phone in the kitchen and wall to a bedroom.. You will have drop outs and hiccups. I'm using these with an iPhone 6S. I listen to podcasts, audiobooks and Apple Music. Wired the sound even more amazing and no dropouts😀 If they worked as well as they looked I wouldn't hesitate to give these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Smiley

customer_reviews.title: They are very pretty and seem to be of quite a high quality
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty and seem to be of quite a high quality. The hands free phone features work great and the bluetooth audio is about on par if not slightly better than what i am used to with other bluetooth devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jon P Allen II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality build
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality build, sound quality and brand, but I was disappointed with the volume level when used wireless. Wired was not much better. To timid and whimpy from such a ballsy innovative company. I don't know what they were thinking other than a potential lawsuit from hearing damage. If that is a true speculation then they should leave it up to the consumer if they want to be deafened. I returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gill

customer_reviews.title: No wireless, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Could not connect Bluetooth. Phones never "see" the headphone bluetooth signal for pairing, even after reset, clearing bluetooth memory. Android and iPhone both could not connect. Not user error, I have other bluetooth devices connected. This was poor quality control or workmanship on the electronics.
customer_reviews.author: NokiaFanToo

customer_reviews.title: so I have a brand new excellent headphones that are not properly working as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I received this headphones about a month and at that moment I didn't had an iPhone. In the instructions stated that volume should work with iOS or apple products and I was planning on acquire an iPhone 7. About a week ago I receive my new iPhone 7 to realize that the volume down boton was not properly working, so I have a brand new excellent headphones that are not properly working as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Gian Soligo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than my original P5'S, they are also much better than my Bose quiet comforts that they've just replaced. I don't profess to be any kind of audiophile as my hearing far from good. I can however, hear far more clarity and differences between the instruments being played. As a reconditioned item they are perfect and with a promotion on, I got a further 25% off! I had a little paranoia about fakes, due to them not coming sealed and being recons, they registered on B&W website fine and that puts my mind at rest that and the fact they sound so good.. I have to say, my most pleasing purchase so far this year,
customer_reviews.author: Bright

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable at the right price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones on prime day at just under £150. At an RRP of over £300 it was a great deal. The headphones have a quality finish with soft leather, they are comfortable and have a fantastic sound. I’ve compared them directly with the beats solo3 and the only real benefit in favour of the beats is the functionality of the W1 chip however in saying that the P5s connect almost instantly. A negative would be the lack of folding and quite bulky quilted case, other headphones have longer battery life ( for me 17 hours or so is ample) At the right price I think these headphones are difficult to beat.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mc GOWAN

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get used to with the very tight clamp
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review and will say if you wan't comfort go for Over-Ears as I have bought Bang and Olufsen on ear and also regretfully these ones too. I have let the headband stretch for couple days, it did feel more comfortable but the pressure was too much on my ears and couldn't get used to it. Sound quality is amazing and the bluetooth connectivity is amazing too, one touch to turn it and connects straight away. I will be sticking with over-ear as I know they give me better comfort and for me comfort is most important over anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Awwab

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome and a genuine bargain at this price
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing in every way, remember to ‘break them in’ for about 24-30hrs before commenting on the sound quality. They really come into their own after this time and movie soundtracks in particular to me sound the most awesome. Sound awesome with iPhone but not on a Huawei mate 20 pro however in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: James Whyman

customer_reviews.title: omg !! my first high-end headphones
customer_reviews.text: best I've had before is A 50 quid in ear job...I took the leap up to high end... Jesus these things are increadable.. two hours in and even though my ears are aching as not used to them being on ...i can't take them off. the soaring violins in forever autumn by Justin Hayward brought a tear to the eye... increadable *****
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice soft leather, very good sound quality through a decent amp or hi-res device but sounds a little bright playing mp3's via a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Neil W

customer_reviews.title: You Need These!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible set of cans - great for all genres of music, very comfortable, high build quality and the sound is just about perfect with very balanced bass, mids and treble and very faithful reproduction of your music. Make sure your audio source is high enough quality. Better than any other wireless I’ve tried and on par with the best wired ones too. Buy them
customer_reviews.author: Mr Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality overall minus a few draws
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones overall. A Premium build and materials and great sound. Comfy Compact and lightweight. Cons: thin cable looks gentle and cheap, leather earcups might get your ears hot and sweaty on hot days, dont have a folding mechanism and too small to wear around you neck between sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the quality of these headphones. I cannot give it a 5 star though as the Bluetooth connection doesn't work with videos from Udemy which I use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, it's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Well, got them when was on sale. It's luxurious design, the sound quality is okay. It's comfortable, the app is not working, but I still like the product but lots of things needed for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: ron suwannaphanu

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, use them all the time for iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, use them all the time for iPhone headset and music playback. As advised by various people I gave them 36h of low volume playback with an iPod to bed them in. Great sound, comfortable to wear. Only minor criticism is that the lead is very thin and feels like it might not be as high quality as the rest of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It sounds really good with good quality music. Battery life is great, more than enough to last when travelling (it's way more than a day in intensive use). It doesn't connect back automatically with my phone, I always have to connect from the phone which is a shame! Overall it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound but....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality but they make your ears sore after a few hours. Tends to block out most of the office chit chat for which I am mostly grateful
customer_reviews.author: sass

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: They are an extremely comfortable. Sound quality is excellent. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Gibbies

customer_reviews.title: expensive but I think they are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: battery life is excelent, sound quality is superb and they are very comfortable to wear for long periods
customer_reviews.author: J Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fails to maintain Bluetooth connection to my phone when I'm out and about. Really disappointed. My phone easily maintains Bluetooth connection to other devices such as portable speakers so I can only assume the Bluetooth connectivity in the headphones is at fault. On the plus side, the sound quality - when connected with the included cable - is great.
customer_reviews.author: dermot_london

customer_reviews.title: Sound wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These sound brilliant. I have had sennheiser and Bose headphones before, but these are much better to my ears. I use them with Tidal and the quality is noticeably better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take a step up
customer_reviews.text: My wife didn’t know that she needed these till I bought them for her .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product, comes with easily replacable spare cable in case of any tears. Sits tightly and comfortably on the head and is excellent at noise cancelling as well, so it's great for outdoor listening. Sound quality is superb, maybe a bit too bassy compared to my previous Audio Technica ATH-ESW9A headphones, but at least it doesn't require the use of equalizer, it's great enough as it is. The only downside maybe if you wear it in hot weather, ears might get steamy. Otherwise, I highly recommend these headphones for any audiophile out there.
customer_reviews.author: Aramintai

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, classy
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, got them on prime day. Comfortable and excellent build quality. Look classy. Not noise cancelling so slightly lower on overall score.
customer_reviews.author: Danish Janjua

customer_reviews.title: Bowers and Wilkins really did a great job making this product
customer_reviews.text: High quality headphones , Bowers and Wilkins really did a great job making this product . If you like the sonic character of the B&W speakers you should definitely go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, though pressure on Jaw
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was really good, though was not very comfortable to wear for long hours as there was too much pressure on the Jaw, that it starts hurting after an hour or so
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Very light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very light, comfortable and very good sound. Love it. More than happy about it. Delivery was also fast
customer_reviews.author: laborie

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these because of dropouts - every minute or so just. Its a shame as they sounded amazing!
customer_reviews.author: mdave

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, pretty
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound quality, comfortable, pretty. Poor ambient sound isolation so not great on planes.
customer_reviews.author: donogh fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Dislike ear pieces very small and rest on, not around, ears. However, sound quality makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Strait Cs

customer_reviews.title: as good as the p7 but a relative
customer_reviews.text: big improvement over the ser 1 version, well worth seeking the ser2....as good as the p7 but a relative bargain
customer_reviews.author: Private Doc.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good and very stylish. Not sure Bluetooth working that well
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Smith

customer_reviews.title: these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly deep and intricate sound. A please to listen to. Not quite as loud or sound insulating as they could be but for pure quality, these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would expect from Bowers & Wilkins,Great materials,Great Build quality & Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: What more can you ask for.....
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are simply amazing! Sound clarity is amazing, bass is solid punchy. Simply a must buy for any music lover!
customer_reviews.author: James Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: The search for a replacement for my AKG K451 continues
customer_reviews.text: Compared them against my trusty AKG451's which while still sonically excellent are getting embarrassing to wear in public. My findings: much quieter. I had to jack up the volume about 10 - 15% to get same sound level but it still seemed to lack impact and presence. While the mid range was a touch cleaner I was losing out badly in bass and top range. Overall a clean but soulless and uninvolved sound. Look great but heavier and tighter than AKG451. The search for a replacement continues.
customer_reviews.author: My Reviews

customer_reviews.title: My favourite headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have always used B&W headphones and I have had most of the lower to mid range that they have produces, P3, P3 series 2, original P5, P5 series 2 and now these. Sound is what you expect from the brand, exemplary but the thing that makes these stand out is the design and more importantly, the comfort. Easily able to wear for long periods of time. Work well with various types of music. Best yet in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Coleon

customer_reviews.title: The Greta reviews are deserved...
customer_reviews.text: Once run in these headphones are sublime. The sound signature is perfect for my tastes, and Ive tried Philips, Sennheiser, Bose, AKG and others to find my perfect set. They sit comfortable, they look good, and they sound great - Did I say? My problem now is I cant help wondering if I shouldn't have spent a bit more and got the Bluetooth version. Absolutely lovely.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Preston Barnes

customer_reviews.title: stylish with good sound reproduction
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones, and the ear pads are very comfortable. They look sleek and stylish, and come with a lovely bag. Sound quality is great! Definitely a good product!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand the hype...
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed how they compared to gaming headphones, although in their defense they are on the ear instead of over the ear. Very classy, great attention to the build and aesthetics, but the sound quality was surprisingly disappointing, I don't understand the hype.
customer_reviews.author: M. Britton

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones! Sound is maybe little bit better on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Sound is maybe little bit better on Sennheiser Momentum, but b&w are better if you wear glasses - doesn't press too much on your ears. BT connectivity works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hrvoje Hudoletnjak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound whilst listening to both classical and rock Very comfortable on the ear (I wear glasses) Lead a little on the short side. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RobertG

customer_reviews.title: Good phones
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound but the lead is too short ...
customer_reviews.author: stratocaster561

customer_reviews.title: the best headphone iv ever bought in my life they are ...
customer_reviews.text: the best headphone iv ever bought in my life they are so comfy I fell asleep in mine in my bed I couldst feel they they are so stylish worth every penny the rang is mental for wireless its went from my loft to my second floor. My house has 3 floors not including the loft. The durability is good just needs a carry case tho :( Bass is 8/10 clarity 11/10 treble 9/10 lows 10/10 Hi's 10/10 thats my review of the Geeky specs would highly recommend this thing of thus little price as a investment to last you years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: Great price £129 for these tells me the P5 series ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price £129 for these tells me the P5 series 3 are on the way however for the price you can't beat these cans.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Bowers & Wilkins P5 Series 2 On Ear...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and comfort but the lead is a bit short and very flimsy. After only a few weeks, it's starting to crackle where it's plugged in. A bit disappointing considering the cost of the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: leanne walters

customer_reviews.title: Bowers & Wilkins P5 Series 2
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are simply superbly made with a near faultless sound quality. I was long overdue an upgrade from my old AKG K450's and was looking around the £200 mark. Auditioned them in john Lewis and they did it for me. I listen to spotify on the extreme setting and they work very well. No issues with comfort whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Craigie

customer_reviews.title: The best headphone ever made
customer_reviews.text: i had the original p5 they are excellent this upgrade improves the headphone in every department. Looks exactly same as the original but don't be fooled bowers have kept the excellent cosmetic design but the p5 s2 feels lot more comfortable around the ear. pads seem a lot more softer. And the sound well where do I start I've tested all the headphones at this price range including the new Bose qc25 doesn't come close to the sound quality of these p5s absolutely fabulous crisp sound whatever you're playing. And we'll the build quality there's no headphone out there comes close to these. Simply put just buy these ill give your money back if you don't like them.
customer_reviews.author: fokrul islam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, suitable for iPhone and more. fast and good service delivery të China.
customer_reviews.author: Leftioni

customer_reviews.title: B and W,s P5 tastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife, offered her the p7,s over the ear as they in my opinion would be more comfortable than on the ear but the p5,s are excellent, she wears them for prolonged periods with her ipad and they are extremely comfortable. The sound quality is fantastic, rich and deep and the build quality is superb, replacement ear pads are avilable as are cables so i wont have to buy a full new set when worn. I will buy myself a pair when ive saved up some pennies again
customer_reviews.author: slicer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect; lovely sound, quality build, comfortable to wear, prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb headphones
customer_reviews.text: Superb headphones. I have the P7's as well but I use the P5's for when I am out and about. A truly excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great design,not to laud,volume controls doesn't work with my samsung s6,overall good but not the best
customer_reviews.author: Damian T.

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, excellent sound quality, comfort and design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Devine experience
customer_reviews.text: Sold as second hand from the AZ wharehouse at a good discount, but like new apart from the box and who cares about the box? Wonderfully made, comfortable to wear, a joy to listen to. An on ear phone from the gods!
customer_reviews.author: DCG

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is excellent but the bluetooth connection is somewhat erratic at best
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent but the bluetooth connection is somewhat erratic at best. My main complaint though is with the way the earpads are constructed. Wear these headphones for a couple of hours each day and within a couple of months they will look as though they are 5 years old! The leather over the earpad sags and wrinkles easily. B&W say that they are taking on the shape of the wearers ears and that they are designed like that!......I say it makes the headphones look shabby and why would you design a product that you know will look rubbish after such a short space of time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fail. Bluetooth just isn't active out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, solid product. Then why the 1 star? They are sold as wireless, so if this doesn't work then they have failed. Spent an entire day trying to pair them, with anything. They just don't show up on any device. Tried the reboot function. The blue light pulses correctly once you've held the power/Bluetooth button in for the 2 seconds but the P5 isn't detected by any other device, even when laying on top of it. Clearly a defected Bluetooth chip. So much for any quality control before shipping. This is my first Bowers & Wilkins product after being a loyal Beyer (and Grado) customer for 25 years (even through in Bose for quiet airtime flying).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phil J. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You never listen to music before trying those. A bit warm for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish cable
customer_reviews.text: They sound good and are quite comfortable, but the cable is rubbish. After only 2 weeks, the sleeve which covers the join between the cable and the jack has already come off. Pathetic for a pair of headphones at this price. I was concerned about the cable as soon as I took it out the box since it feels flimsy. And the sleeve is where you grip it to insert/remove the cable, so that should be the strongest part of the cable.
customer_reviews.author: John McClane

customer_reviews.title: Great sound BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The P5s sound wonderful, BUT they would only "pair" briefly and spasmodically with a series of three transmitters. First, I returned the transmitters as I assumed they were the problem. After the third transmitter I reluctantly had to accept that the P5s were the problem. As an experiment, I bought a £15 pair of wireless 'phones. They work straight away, every time! The P5s have a very limited range, my £15 'phones are hugely superior here. However I will probably buy another pair of P5s at some time in the future and hope they work.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connectivity is flaky Mcflakerson
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding but the bluetooth connection kept dropping - pretty much unusable anywhere other than at home. Not worth the outlay in my opinion and they have been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Alistair Young

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: Tried with 3 different devices. A Samsung Galaxy Note 8 a HTC 10 and a LG V30. The LG V30 being having a quad DAC. First tried over Bluetooth and not loud enough so then tried them wired, they were a bit louder but still no where near loud enough. So not doubting the quality but they are very quiet. Kind of disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jada H.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, there are cheaper headphones with same sound quality out there. They are very uncomfortable as they press your ears to hard, it gets really uncomfortable after only 10 minutes. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anabella

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good but not brilliant for £200+ it should be brilliant
customer_reviews.text: straight to point it is my personal review it may help next person.Sound is good but not brilliant for £200+ it should be brilliant. I have used it on my htc m8 and my Hi End HI FI I do not wish to enlist my equipment.Mids are good bass is good but there could be more punch. Treble is soft to medium there is no attack. Comfortable for half an hour to an hour not for prolonged use.I will keep it purely for looks and feel also comfort over sennheiser m2. Sound compared to sennheiser m2 little bit better but i had to return m2 to amazon because of sound and comfort also price point. good luck
customer_reviews.author: M Uddin

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins P5 Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Black
product_meta.description: Bowers & Wilkins P5 Wireless combines fantastic sound and luxurious materials with advanced Bluetooth streaming for an unrivalled wireless acoustic performance. Best-in-class acoustic design. The best Bluetooth streaming technology. Put these together, and you can enjoy all the freedom and convenience of wireless headphones, without compromising on sound quality.
feature_bullets: P5 Wireless combines the fantastic sound of P5 Series 2, with advanced Bluetooth streaming for unrivalled wireless acoustic performance. Impedance : 22 ohms (passive)
Using high quality Bluetooth aptX, P5 Wireless allows you to stream Hi-Fi quality music from your smart phone, tablet or computer
An incredible battery life of 17 hours of wireless playback between charges. P5 Wireless charges via USB and if you want to save your battery, it also comes supplied with a cable.
P5 Wireless features drive units based on the award winning P7, designed with a diaphragm like traditional loudspeakers, resulting in more precise diaphragm movement and amazing sound quality.
Bowers & Wilkins has more than five decades of experience creating the world's best loudspeakers, and they've put that expertise into the P5 Wireless for a stunning pair of headphones

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars274 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
